skill_constraints: Single points of failure in Backend, DevOps, and QA.
resource_bottlenecks: backend.dev1 in Sprint 3; frontend.dev1 in Sprint 4.

skill_constraints: Onboarding overhead for new backend contractor in Sprint 3.
resource_bottlenecks: Coordination and knowledge transfer to contractor.
mitigation_strategies: Assign backend lead as dedicated point of contact for contractor.

skill_constraints: Loss of frontend.dev2. All accessibility work is delayed or done by lead.
resource_bottlenecks: frontend.dev1 becomes a critical bottleneck for all UI work.
mitigation_strategies: De-scope non-critical UI features. Shift QA E2E test writing to frontend lead.
